text: depends on whether the tumor is a dysgerminoma or another type of ovarian germ cell tumor.    Treatment of dysgerminoma may include the following:          - Total abdominal hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy followed by chemotherapy, with removal of as much of the cancer in the pelvis and abdomen as possible.     -  Unilateral salpingo-oophorectomy followed by chemotherapy.
